room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: We did antidote. Not only is the room crazy entertaining but it was challenging and had us stumpped a bit.. overalll we had a blast. They were friendly, informative and complimentary trinkets to help remember yur time at this fantastic location!!! Soo worth it!!! Bring yur family. Yur kids!!! 5 minute friends!!! Hell bring a tinder date. Its sooo worth it!!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: I LOVED THIS ESCAPE ROOM. My boyfriend and I had gone to an escape room a year prior to this and we did not have fun. The room was very difficult and not put together well at all. We decided that we would try to go to another escape room and we found Escapology! We did the "Antidote" room and it was incredible! We felt like we were actually trying to find an antidote! The room was realistic and fun. It was set up so well! We're going to go again tomorrow :)

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: We did the "Antidote" room with 2 adults, 2 teens and 2 4th graders. We escaped and had a great time doing it. The decor and theming is wonderfully immersive. I highly recommend Escapology.
